title: P1: Trust signals (badges + last-updated + status indicators)
description: Add trust signals to plugin cards and detail pages: (1) Status dot: Active (<30d green), Maintained (<90d yellow), Stale (>=90d red) based on git log timestamps, (2) Badges: Featured (manual config list), New (<14d since created), (3) 'Last updated X days ago' label, (4) GitHub stars if available from catalog, (5) No runtime API calls - all from build-time catalog. Match existing badge/icon styling.
close_reason: Trust signals on homepage with featured plugins section (7866f105)

title: P1: Quick-start workflow templates (1-click install)
description: Add pre-configured stack templates on homepage/plugins page: (1) Security Hardening Stack (security-auditor + backend-security-coder + frontend-security-coder), (2) Full Stack Development (frontend-developer + backend-architect + database-optimizer), (3) Testing Excellence (test-automator + performance-engineer + qa tools), (4) DevOps Automation (devops-automation-pack + kubernetes-architect + deployment tools), (5) One-click install all button per template, (6) Show plugin count and setup steps. Reduces decision fatigue.
close_reason: Quick-start templates page with 6 workflow stacks (aa35026b)

title: P0: Client-side install tracking (localStorage analytics)
description: Add lightweight client-side tracking: (1) Track plugin views/installs to localStorage, (2) Show 'Popular This Week' section on homepage from aggregated data, (3) Display 'X users installed this' on plugin cards (if data available), (4) No server required - pure client-side. Respects privacy, no personal data collected.

title: P2: Plugin comparison view (side-by-side)
description: Add comparison feature: (1) 'Compare' checkbox on plugin cards (select 2-3), (2) Side-by-side table showing: skills count, categories, last updated, status, key features, (3) AI recommendation of best choice with reasoning, (4) Clear winner highlight, (5) Comparison permalink for sharing. Helps users decide between similar plugins.

title: P1: Plugin detail pages (/plugins/<slug>) with skill triggers
description: Generate per-plugin detail pages from catalog: (1) Full description, categories, skills summary, (2) Install command with copy button, (3) Trust signals (last updated, status dot, badges), (4) Skill trigger phrase examples (curated list), (5) 'Works well with' related plugins, (6) Links to source path/repo, (7) Consistent styling with existing theme. Static-generated or dynamic route based on Astro capabilities.
close_reason: Plugin detail pages complete with skills, triggers, and recommendations (bc5dfed3)

title: EPIC: Deploy Test Harness Learning Lab to Nixtla

Includes: all guides (60+ pages), reference implementation (schema-optimization), working verification scripts, exercises, and teaching materials. Must align with nixtla's skills standards and workspace conventions.
close_reason: EPIC COMPLETE: Test Harness Learning Lab successfully deployed to nixtla/002-workspaces/test-harness-lab/. All 12 tasks completed. Deliverables: 4 comprehensive guides (61KB), complete reference implementation (9 files), nixtla-specific docs (4 files), integration guide, exercises. Documentation synced: 002-workspaces/README.md and CLAUDE.md updated. 3 follow-up issues created in nixtla workspace. System tested end-to-end. Ready for production use.

title: Test complete system end-to-end in nixtla

System ready for final polish.

title: P0: /plugins catalog page with enhanced search (fuzzy + relevance)
description: Add /plugins route in marketplace. Load catalog.json. Implement: (1) Fuzzy search using fuse.js (threshold 0.3) with relevance scoring (skills*5 + stars + active bonus), (2) Filter chips by category/type/hasSkills, (3) Sort dropdown (Relevance/Updated/Newest/Alphabetical/Skills), (4) Plugin cards using existing theme styles, (5) Copy install button per card, (6) Keyboard shortcuts (/ for search, esc to clear, arrows to navigate, enter to select). No global theme changes.
close_reason: /plugins page complete with fuzzy search, filters, sorting, keyboard shortcuts (5dbe376a)

title: P1: Stack Builder with compatibility warnings + export options
description: Add Stack Builder UI (section on /plugins or dedicated /stack page). Features: (1) Multi-select plugins with counts by category, (2) Compatibility warnings (detect conflicts from static config), (3) Generate combined install script, (4) Shareable URL (?stack=slug1,slug2,slug3), (5) Export as markdown/JSON/shell script, (6) Copy-to-clipboard for all formats, (7) localStorage persistence. Match existing theme. Show plugin overlap warnings.

title: P0: Build-time catalog index generator (single JSON source)
description: Create generator script that produces marketplace/src/data/catalog.json from repo inventory. Fields: slug, name, description, categories, type, hasSkills, skillCount, installCommand, sourcePath, lastUpdatedEpoch (from git log -1 --format=%ct), badges (Featured/New based on <14d). No runtime GitHub API. Add npm script: catalog:build. Must build before marketplace build.

title: P2: Real-time metrics dashboard (homepage stats)
description: Add live metrics section to homepage: (1) Total plugins count (from catalog), (2) Total AI skills count, (3) New this week count (<7d), (4) Trending plugins list (top 5 by install velocity if tracking enabled), (5) Auto-update on page load, (6) Animated counters for visual polish. Pure client-side using catalog.json data.

title: Marketplace UX vNext: World-Class Discovery & Engagement
description: Ship interactive marketplace UX that matches AND beats aitmpl.com. Includes: build-time catalog index, /plugins page (search/filter/sort with fuzzy matching), Stack Builder (multi-select + shareable URL + compatibility warnings), plugin detail pages, trust signals, quick-start templates, keyboard shortcuts, and export options. Preserves existing theme/branding. Static-build friendly.
